name: Sukhavati—净土
description:
current verison:Jams

在黑暗与光明的交接处，最后一名精灵勇士誓死保卫精灵一族的生命之树。

邪灵们再一次叫嚣着涌了上来，只有一种办法能让他们不再复活。

他仔细擦拭仅有的武器，立誓斩尽污染了这片神圣土地的每一个怪物，并永远将怪物们的灵魂献祭于树，成为生命之树的养料。

这是他生存下去的唯一希望——也是这里唯一的净土。

At the junction of darkness and light, the last elven warrior vowed to defend the tree of life of the elves.

The evil spirits came up again, and there was only one way to stop them from reviving.

He carefully wiped his only weapons, vowed to kill every monster that had polluted this sacred land, and always sacrificed the souls of the monsters to the tree as the nourishment of the tree of life.

This is his only hope for survival - and the only pure land here.
